```{r}

```
```{r}
rm(list = ls())
stl_lead <- read_csv(here::here("data","stl_blood_lead.csv"))
stl_lead <- stl_lead |>
  clean_names()
names(stl_lead)
```
```{r}
stl_lead_prop <- stl_lead|>
  mutate(prop_white = (white/total_pop) * 100)

dim(stl_lead)
names(stl_lead_prop)
```

```{r}
mutate(stl_lead, prop_white = (white/total_pop)*100)
```

```{r}
# Basic summary
summary(stl_lead)

# Glimpse structure
glimpse(stl_lead)

# Visualize distribution of lead tests
ggplot <- # Basic summary
summary(stl_lead)

# Glimpse structure
glimpse(stl_lead)

# Visualize distribution of lead tests
ggplot(stl_lead, aes(x = pct_elevated)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1, fill = "steelblue", color = "white") +
  labs(title = "Distribution of High Lead Tests", x = "High Tests", y = "Count")

ggplot
```
